locations.name: Koggala
locations.description: Starting point on the idyllic southern coast, known for beaches, palm trees, and proximity to stilt fishermen.

locations.name: Yala National Park Area
locations.description: Sri Lanka's premier wildlife destination, famous for leopards, elephants, and diverse fauna. Overnight stays are typically in nearby towns like Tissamaharama or Kataragama, or lodges bordering the park.

locations.name: Tea Country (likely Ella or Nuwara Eliya area)
locations.description: Cool, misty highlands characterized by rolling hills covered in tea plantations, offering scenic beauty and colonial charm. Coordinates are approximate for Ella, a popular base.

locations.name: Bentota
locations.description: Final coastal town known for its calm waters, golden beaches, water sports, and relaxation.
